verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG1: nuclear war with North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: multiple times] and pushed very harsh sanctions on the country after its nuclear and missile tests . Moon Jae - in thi
[ARG0: Trump] threatened nuclear war with North Korea multiple times and [V: pushed] [ARG1: very harsh sanctions on the country] [ARGM-TMP: after its nuclear and missile tests] . Moon Jae - in thi
